mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_id, prdt_id, category, member_email, review_content, review_title, rating) VALUES (review_seq.nextval, #{prdtId}, #{category}, #{memberEmail}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewTitle}, #{rating})
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_content = #{reviewContent}, review_date = sysdate WHERE review_id = #{reviewId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_comment (comment_id, review_id, member_email, comment_content, parent_comment_id) VALUES (comment_seq.nextval, #{reviewId}, #{memberEmail}, #{commentContent}, #{parentCommentId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM review_comment WHERE review_id = #{reviewId} ORDER BY review_id DESC
